languages.text: "Мало вы знаете! Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} не простил{rt_mf||а} виноватому промах. Приказал{rt_mf||а} привести его семью и долго их пытал{rt_mf||а}. А пока пытал{rt_mf||а} — смеял{rt_mf|ся|ась} так, что аж крысы по углам от жути подохли".
languages.translation_comment: убрать, если сожгли в печи обоих (или кого-то одного)

traits.locale_text: "На публике он{rt_mf||а} — справедливый судья. Но Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} не простил{rt_mf||а} виноватому промах. Приказал{rt_mf||а} привести его семью и долго их пытал{rt_mf||а}. А пока пытал{rt_mf||а} — смеял{rt_mf|ся|ась} так, что аж крысы по углам от жути подохли".

languages.text: "You know so little! The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} never forgave the man for his misstep. {rt_mf|He|She} had his family brought before {rt_mf|him|her} and tortured them at length. And {rt_mf|he|she} laughed throughout the entire ordeal, with a voice so sinister, even the rats in the corners died of sheer horror."
languages.original_text: "Мало вы знаете! Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} не простил{rt_mf||а} виноватому промах. Приказал{rt_mf||а} привести его семью и долго их пытал{rt_mf||а}. А пока пытал{rt_mf||а} — смеял{rt_mf|ся|ась} так, что аж крысы по углам от жути подохли".

traits.locale_text: "You know so little! The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} never forgave the man for his misstep. {rt_mf|He|She} had his family brought before {rt_mf|him|her} and tortured at length. And {rt_mf|he|she} laughed throughout the ordeal, with a voice so sinister, even the rats in the corners died of sheer horror."

And {rt_mf|he|she} laughed throughout the ordeal, with a voice so sinister, even the rats in the corners died of sheer horror."

And {rt_mf|he|she} laughed throughout the entire ordeal, with a voice so sinister, even the rats in the corners died of sheer horror."

And {rt_mf|he|she} laughed throughout the entire ordeal, with a voice so sinister, even the rats in the corners died of sheer horror."

"You know so little! The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} never forgave the man for his misstep. {rt_mf|He|She} had his family brought before {rt_mf|him|her} and tortured them at length. And {rt_mf|he|she} laughed throughout the entire ordeal, with a voice so sinister, even the rats in the corners died of sheer horror."

"You know so little! The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} never forgave the man for his misstep. {rt_mf|He|She} had his family brought before {rt_mf|him|her} and tortured them at length. And {rt_mf|he|she} laughed throughout the entire ordeal, with a voice so sinister, even the rats in the corners died of sheer horror."

languages.translation_comment: убрать, если сожгли в печи обоих (или кого-то одного)

languages.text: “远远不止你说的这些！那位大人根本没有原谅那些人的罪过。{rt_mf|他|她}下令把那些人的家人带到{rt_mf|他|她}面前，活活折磨了他们很久很久。整个刑讯过程中，{rt_mf|他|她}一直在放声大笑。{rt_mf|他|她}的笑声是那么邪恶，就连角落里的老鼠都被活活吓死了。”
languages.original_text: "You know so little! The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} never forgave the man for his misstep. {rt_mf|He|She} had his family brought before {rt_mf|him|her} and tortured them at length. And {rt_mf|he|she} laughed throughout the entire ordeal, with a voice so sinister, even the rats in the corners died of sheer horror."

traits.locale_text: “远远不止你说的这些！那位大人根本没有原谅那些人的罪过。{rt_mf|他|她}下令把那些人的家人带到{rt_mf|他|她}面前，活活折磨了他们很久很久。整个刑讯过程中，{rt_mf|他|她}一直在放声大笑。{rt_mf|他|她}的笑声是那么邪恶，就连角落里的老鼠都被活活吓死了。”

languages.text: «¡No sabéis nada! {rt_mf|El Señor Celestial|La Señora Celestial} nunca perdonó el error del hombre. Hizo que trajeran ante {rt_mf|él|ella} a toda su familia y los torturó durante mucho tiempo. Y, durante todo el proceso, no dejó de reírse con una voz tan siniestra que las ratas de las esquinas murieron de terror».
languages.original_text: "You know so little! The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} never forgave the man for his misstep. {rt_mf|He|She} had his family brought before {rt_mf|him|her} and tortured them at length. And {rt_mf|he|she} laughed throughout the entire ordeal, with a voice so sinister, even the rats in the corners died of sheer horror."

traits.locale_text: «¡No sabéis nada! {rt_mf|El Señor Celestial|La Señora Celestial} nunca perdonó el error del hombre. Hizo que trajeran ante {rt_mf|él|ella} a toda su familia y los torturó durante mucho tiempo. Y, durante todo el proceso, no dejó de reírse con una voz tan siniestra que las ratas de las esquinas murieron de terror».

languages.text: "Hiçbir şey bilmiyorsun! Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, adamın hatasını asla affetmedi. Ailesini huzuruna getirtti ve uzun süre işkence ettirdi. Tüm bu çile boyunca o kadar uğursuzca güldü ki kuytudaki fareler bile korkudan can verdi."
languages.original_text: "You know so little! The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} never forgave the man for his misstep. {rt_mf|He|She} had his family brought before {rt_mf|him|her} and tortured them at length. And {rt_mf|he|she} laughed throughout the entire ordeal, with a voice so sinister, even the rats in the corners died of sheer horror."

traits.locale_text: "Hiçbir şey bilmiyorsun! Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, adamın hatasını asla affetmedi. Ailesini huzuruna getirtti ve uzun süre işkence ettirdi. Tüm bu çile boyunca o kadar uğursuzca güldü ki kuytudaki fareler bile korkudan can verdi."

"Halkın içinde tarafsız yargıcı oynuyor. Ama Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, adamın hatasını asla affetmedi. Ailesini huzuruna getirtti ve uzun süre işkence ettirdi. Tüm bu çile boyunca o kadar uğursuzca güldü ki kuytudaki fareler bile korkudan can verdi."

languages.text: 「あなたは何も分かってないよ！天の{rt_mf|君|姫}はあの男の失態を絶対に許さなかったの。{rt_mf|彼|彼女}は被告の家族を連れてこさせて、徹底的に苦しめたんだ。その間、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}はずっと笑い続けてた。あまりに邪悪な声だったから、片隅に潜んでいたネズミですら恐怖で身悶えて死んでいったんだって」
languages.original_text: "You know so little! The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} never forgave the man for his misstep. {rt_mf|He|She} had his family brought before {rt_mf|him|her} and tortured them at length. And {rt_mf|he|she} laughed throughout the entire ordeal, with a voice so sinister, even the rats in the corners died of sheer horror."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは何も分かってないよ！天の{rt_mf|君|姫}はあの男の失態を絶対に許さなかったの。{rt_mf|彼|彼女}は被告の家族を連れてこさせて、徹底的に苦しめたんだ。その間、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}はずっと笑い続けてた。あまりに邪悪な声だったから、片隅に潜んでいたネズミですら恐怖で身悶えて死んでいったんだって」

languages.text: « Vous ne savez rien ! Sa Céleste Seigneurie ne lui a jamais pardonné son faux pas.{rt_mf|Il|Elle} a fait venir sa famille et s'est {rt_mf|adonné|adonnée} à une longue séance de torture. {rt_mf|Il|Elle} a ri tout au long du supplice, d'un rire si sinistre que même les rats en sont morts de peur. »
languages.original_text: "You know so little! The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} never forgave the man for his misstep. {rt_mf|He|She} had his family brought before {rt_mf|him|her} and tortured them at length. And {rt_mf|he|she} laughed throughout the entire ordeal, with a voice so sinister, even the rats in the corners died of sheer horror."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne savez rien ! Sa Céleste Seigneurie ne lui a jamais pardonné son faux pas.{rt_mf|Il|Elle} a fait venir sa famille et s'est {rt_mf|adonné|adonnée} à une longue séance de torture. {rt_mf|Il|Elle} a ri tout au long du supplice, d'un rire si sinistre que même les rats en sont morts de peur. »

« {rt_mf|Il|Elle} préfère passer pour {rt_mf|un|une} juge impartial en public, mais en réalité, {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste ne lui a jamais pardonné son faux pas.{rt_mf|Il|Elle} a fait venir sa famille et s'est {rt_mf|adonné|adonnée} à une longue séance de torture. {rt_mf|Il|Elle} a ri tout au long du supplice, d'un rire si sinistre que même les rats en sont morts de peur. »

languages.text: "Ihr wisst so wenig! {rt_mf|Der himmlische Herr|Die himmlische Herrin} hat dem Mann seinen Fehltritt nie vergeben. {rt_mf|Er|Sie} ließ dessen Familie vorführen und ausgiebig foltern. Und während der gesamten Tortur hat {rt_mf|er|sie} gelacht, mit einer so unheimlichen Stimme, dass sogar die Ratten in den Ecken vor Angst gestorben sind."
languages.original_text: "You know so little! The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} never forgave the man for his misstep. {rt_mf|He|She} had his family brought before {rt_mf|him|her} and tortured them at length. And {rt_mf|he|she} laughed throughout the entire ordeal, with a voice so sinister, even the rats in the corners died of sheer horror."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wisst so wenig! {rt_mf|Der himmlische Herr|Die himmlische Herrin} hat dem Mann seinen Fehltritt nie vergeben. {rt_mf|Er|Sie} ließ dessen Familie vorführen und ausgiebig foltern. Und während der gesamten Tortur hat {mf|er|sie} gelacht, mit einer so unheimlichen Stimme, dass sogar die Ratten in den Ecken vor Angst gestorben sind."
